channel.title: Research on HydroSense Lab, IIT Delhi
channel.description: Recent content in Research on HydroSense Lab, IIT Delhi

item.title: Datasets
item.description: We have developed various datasets for our research activities. As much as we can, we release them to the public in the spirit of Open Science/Open Data.

item.title: Flashiness in the United States
item.description: Mapping flood flood severity in the United States using data-driven techniques.

item.title: India Flood Inventory
item.description: We are building a historical flood observation database over India. More later.

item.title: INDRA Crowdsourcing Framework
item.description: INDRA Reporter is a free app for crowdsourcing reports on weather and water-related natural hazards such as floods, heavy rains, landslides etc. from Citizen Scientists. This app is a part of Project INDRA, which is a comprehensive multi-platform framework using apps, chat bots, web forms etc. Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.indra Dashboard: https://indra.iitd.ac.in/ Work in Progress. More to be added soon.
